array.string: <b:t>To bake a chocolate cake,</b:t> <b:ot tag="a">4 eggs</b:ot> <b:t>are needed for every</b:t> <b:ot tag="b">1 bar of chocolate.</b:ot> <b:t>What is the ratio of eggs to chocolate?</b:t>
<b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">4</b:ot> <b:op op=":" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="b" enabled="no">1</b:ot>
<b:t>What is the ratio of chocolate to eggs?</b:t>
<b:ot tag="b" enabled="no">1</b:ot> <b:op op=":" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">4</b:ot>
<b:t>There are</b:t> <b:ot tag="c">3 bars of chocolate.</b:ot> <b:t>How many eggs are needed?</b:t>
<b:ot tag="c" enabled="no">3</b:ot> <b:op op="x" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">4</b:ot> <b:ot picker="yes" pickerTarget="12">12</b:ot>
